snippet: A manager who turned around Germany’s national railway and second largest airline took over the company behind the construction of Berlin’s new international airport on Friday.
abstract: Hartmut Mehdorn, tough manager who turned around Germany's national railway and second largest airline, takes over company behind construction of Berlin-Brandenburg Willy Brandt Airport.
lead_paragraph: A manager who turned around Germany’s national railway and second largest airline took over the company behind the construction of Berlin’s new international airport on Friday.
